COMMON.DISCOUNTS: Be the first one to know about discounts, offers and events. Unsubscribe whenever you like.

HOME.TITLE: Entrepreneurs need a successful playbook
HOME.SUBTITLE: Playbook helps entrepreneurs build better products and companies, faster and cheaper by following successful playbooks.
HOME.DESIGN: Design playbooks to grow revenue, reduce costs and maximize efficiency
HOME.DESIGN_SUB: Using these proven design tools, we mae sure our clients receive the result they expect within the set timeframe.
HOME.TOP_BLOCK_DESC: Create a unique mobile app or a polished website that will work like a charm across all platforms and keep the users coming back.
HOME.TOOLS_SUBTITLE: Using these proven design tools, we make sure our clients receive the result they expect within the set timeframe.
HOME.TOP_DESC: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit sed do eiusmod tempor
HOME.IMPROVEMENT: Hey. I’m Chris, an Entrepreneur and the creator of Playbook. I couldn’t find common place to find, refine and store my business playbooks in a modern way...so I decided to build one!
HOME.TEXT_1: If you’d like to chat or share some feedback, I'd love to hear from you. Shoot me a message on Twitter or Email.
HOME.TEXT_2: I do my best to ship new features often, and implement the top suggestion ideas from the community.
HOME.TEXT_3: My mission is to help guide the next generation of creators, entrepreneurs, and founders to build companies that are just, equitable and progressive towards the sustainability of the human race.
HOME.BEST_PLAYBOOK: The best playbooks help you win.
HOME.TELL_US: All your successful playbooks, in one place. Know what to focus on and execute next.
HOME.WHY_TITLE_2: Know what plays to execute and when
HOME.WHY_TITLE_3: Join a community of experts and innovators
HOME.WHY_DESC_1: Find, learn and read successful playbooks. Have your playbooks easily available to you when you need them. Learn from people who have done it before. Don’t make the same mistakes they did!
HOME.WHY_DESC_2: Know what to focus on and execute next. Playbook helps you prioritize and focus on solving your toughest challenges to move your product and company forward.
HOME.WHY_DESC_3: Collaborate and join a network of experts on topics that are important to you. Turn intention into action, today. Pick a topic, find the winning plays and win with the results you get!
HOME.WHY_DESC_4: Been there, done that? Publish and monetize your own successful playbooks that you create based on your skills and experience. Be a thought leader on your craft and show people how things are done!
HOME.WHY_DESC_5: Build your own audience on playbook by promoting your playbook and getting views. The higher quality and value your playbook provides, the higher chances of reaching more people!
HOME.CHART_TITLE: Achieve tangible results faster and cheaper with Playbook
HOME.CHART_TEXT: Using proven and tested methods, playbooks allow you to achieve your successful outcome, cheaper and faster.
HOME.CHART2_TITLE: Playbook has a place for you at all stages of your company
HOME.CHART2_TEXT: Your journey will be different depending on various stages of your company. Playbook allows you to purchase and build your own playbooks depending on your need.
HOME.WHAT_SAY_TEXT: Using these proven design tools, we mae sure our clients receive the result they expect within the set timeframe.
HOME.PRICE_DESC: Demonstrate empathy maps and finally improve outcomes.
HOME.APP_DESC: From playbooks by successful entrepreneurs to learning to achieve $1M in ARR for your product via founder led sales, Playbook gives you the tools and platform to solve your toughest challenges with a community just like you.
HOME.JOB_TITLE: Entrepreneurs have many jobs to be done.
HOME.JOB_TEXT: Purchase and build a set of playbooks and plays to follow for each job on your list.
